description:
Curling is the world famous sport in which players slide stones across a sheet of ice toward a target area, the "house". Two teams, each of four players, take turns sliding heavy stones, also called "rocks".

You can also challenge your friends to a multiplayer game to show everyone who the best player is!

Key Features:

- Realistic curling game

- Real-time physics

- Colourful 3D graphics

- Play against the computer AI or player vs player

- Multiplayer (Hotseat or Multicard)

- Unlockable achievements
name: Curling Super Championship
